se.hig.exte.restcontroller

Class SubjectController

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.hig.exte.restcontroller.SubjectController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/subjects")
public class SubjectController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a RestController class responsible for mapping HTTP requests for the /subjects path. It contains mappings of end-points to CrudServices that operate on Subject records in the database.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      SubjectController(SubjectService subjectService)
      Creates a SubjectController object.

        @Autowired
public SubjectController(SubjectService subjectService)
        Creates a SubjectController object.

    • Method Detail

      • saveSubject

        @PostMapping(value="/")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Subject> saveSubject(@RequestBody
                                                                                             Subject subject)
        Creates a Subject and stores it in the database.
        Parameters:
        subject - The Subject to add in the form of a JSON-object in the POST request.
        Returns:
        A ResponseEntity object containing the saved Subject and an HTTP status code.

      • getSubject

        @GetMapping(value="/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Subject> getSubject(@PathVariable
                                                                                               int id)
        Fetches the Subject object with the given ID from the database.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the Subject to fetch.
        Returns:
        The Subject with the given ID.

      • getAllCourses

        @GetMapping(value="/all")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<Subject>> getAllCourses()
        Fetches all Subject records from the database and returns them as a ResponseEntity object. List of Subject objects is automatically converted to JSON using Spring Boot's HttpMessageConverter and put in the ResponseEntity's body.
        Returns:
        A ResponseEntity object containing the fetched Subject objects.

      • getSubjectByAcademyId

        @GetMapping(value="/academy/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<Subject>> getSubjectByAcademyId(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                  int id)
        Fetches all Subject objects belonging to the specified Academy ID. List of Subject objects is automatically converted to JSON using Spring Boot's HttpMessageConverter and put in the ResponseEntity's body.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the Academy to which the Subjects belongs.
        Returns:
        A ResponseEntity object containing a List of Subject objects.

      • patchSubject

        @PatchMapping(value="/")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Subject> patchSubject(@RequestBody
                                                                                               Subject subject)
        Updates the Subject object with the given ID in the database.
        Parameters:
        subject - The Subject to update in the form of a JSON-object in the POST request.
        Returns:
        A ResponseEntity object containing the updated Subject and an HTTP status code.

      • deleteSubjectById

        @DeleteMapping(value="/{id}")
public void deleteSubjectById(@PathVariable
                                                             int id)
        Deletes the Subject object with the given ID from the database.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the Subject to delete.

        @GetMapping(value="/search/{text}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<Subject>> search(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                    java.lang.String text)
